languages.text: "Ты собственными руками уничтожила свое будущее. Когда истина стала бы известна, все оружие Комморры обратилось бы против тебя — и моего кабала!"
"You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"
languages.original_text: "Ты собственными руками уничтожила свое будущее. Когда истина стала бы известна, все оружие Комморры обратилось бы против тебя — и моего кабала!"

traits.locale_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of the Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of the Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of the Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of the Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你亲手毁了你自己的未来。一旦真相大白，科摩罗所有人都会举起武器反对你！反对我的阴谋团！”
languages.original_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: “你亲手毁了你自己的未来。一旦真相大白，科摩罗所有人都会举起武器反对你！反对我的阴谋团！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez détruit votre avenir de vos propres mains. Si la vérité avait éclaté, toutes les armes de Commorragh se seraient retournées contre vous... et contre ma Kabale ! »
languages.original_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez détruit votre avenir de vos propres mains. Si la vérité avait éclaté, toutes les armes de Commorragh se seraient retournées contre vous... et contre ma Kabale ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Has destruido tu futuro con tus propias manos. Al salir a la luz la verdad, todas las armas de Commorragh habrían estado dirigidas contra ti... ¡y contra mi Kábala!».
languages.original_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: «Has destruido tu futuro con tus propias manos. Al salir a la luz la verdad, todas las armas de Commorragh habrían estado dirigidas contra ti... ¡y contra mi Kábala!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前はその手で自らの未来を壊した。真実が知れたら、コモラフのあらゆる武器がお前に向くだろうぜ…そして俺の陰謀団にもな！」
languages.original_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前はその手で自らの未来を壊した。真実が知れたら、コモラフのあらゆる武器がお前に向くだろうぜ…そして俺の陰謀団にもな！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt Eure Zukunft mit Euren eigenen Händen zerstört. Wäre die Wahrheit ans Licht gekommen, hätten sich alle Waffen Commorraghs gegen Euch gewendet — und gegen meine Kabale!"
languages.original_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Eure Zukunft mit Euren eigenen Händen zerstört. Wäre die Wahrheit ans Licht gekommen, hätten sich alle Waffen Commorraghs gegen Euch gewendet — und gegen meine Kabale!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Geleceğini kendi ellerinle yok ettin. Gerçek ortaya çıktığında Commorragh'ın tüm silahları sana ve Kabalıma çevrilecekti!"
languages.original_text: "You destroyed your future with your own hands. When the truth became known, all the weapons of Commorragh would have turned against you — and against my Kabal!"

traits.locale_text: "Geleceğini kendi ellerinle yok ettin. Gerçek ortaya çıktığında Commorragh'ın tüm silahları sana çevrilecekti. Kabal'ıma ve de!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
